const headerImg = '/images/polkasmith/header_img.png'; const arrowRightIcon = '/images/icons/arrow-right.svg'; const iconUP = '/images/polkasmith/icon_up.png'; const arrowUp = '/images/polkasmith/arrow_up.png'; const polkaLogo = '/images/polkasmith/polka_logo.svg' const JoinPolkaSmith = (props: any) => { const styles = useStyles(); const myRef = useRef(null) const [question, setQuestion] = useState(0); const [currentWallet, setCurrentWallet] = useState(localStorage.getItem('SELECTED_KSM_WALLET')); const [isWalletLoading, setIsWalletLoading] = useState(true); const [selectedAccount, setSelectedAccount] = useState(true); const [selectOptions, setSelectOptions] = useState([]); const [showScrollTop, setShowScrollTop] = useState(false); const [isConnected, setIsConnected] = useState(false); const [ksmBalance, setKsmBalance] = useState(false); const WAValidator = require('wallet-address-validator'); const receivedAddress = '5GrwvaEF5zXb26Fz9rcQpDWS57CtERHpNehXCPcNoHGKutQY' const provider = new WsProvider('wss://halongbay.polkafoundry.com'); const selectQuestion = (index: React.SetStateAction) => { if (index === question) { setQuestion(0) } else { setQuestion(index) } } const scrollToTop = () => { window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: "smooth" }); } // @ts-ignore const executeScroll = () => myRef.current.scrollIntoView() document.addEventListener("scroll", (e) => { if (window.pageYOffset > 600) { setShowScrollTop(true) } else { setShowScrollTop(false) } }); // @ts-ignore const formatOptionLabel = ({value, label}) => (

) const onchangePolWallet = (e: any) => { setSelectedAccount(e) setCurrentWallet(e.data.address) localStorage.setItem('SELECTED_KSM_WALLET', e.data.address) //checkLinkedWallet(e.data.address) getBalance(e.data.address) } const getBalance = (address: any) => { ApiPromise.create({provider}).then((api) => { api.query.system.account(address).then(account => { // @ts-ignore return setKsmBalance(account.data.free); }) }) } useEffect(() => { }, []) return (

Join PolkaSmith on Kusama Parachain Auction

PolkaSmith is the canary network of PolkaFoundry on Kusama. PolkaSmiths native token is PKS, which we migrated from PolkaFoundrys PKF at a 1:1 ratio.

Participants who support PolkaSmith to win the Kusama auction will earn worthy rewards in PKS. In addition, there are an extra 5% PKS for participants on Red Kite, 0.5% for referrals, and 10% for early birds.

PolkaSmith Auction Plan

1st - 8th

Parachain Slot

PolkaSmith will participate in 1st-8th slot auctions to win. In other words, we aim to lease a parachain slot for 48 weeks (each lease period is six weeks). Understanding that competition for parachain is intense, if PolkaSmith doesnt win the first auction, we will keep bidding until we won a slot and only give up after N rounds (TBA).

100 PKS

/ 1 KSM

Winning reward

If PolkaSmith wins, every KSM that supports PolkaSmith in the Kusama Parachain Slot auction through the crowdloan will be entitled to 100 $PKS as a reward. PKS is the native token of PolkaSmith, which you can claim from PKF at a 1:1 ratio. Note that if PolkaSmith wins Kusama Slot, the value for PKF may scale significantly.

50 ePKF

/ 1 KSM

Whether Win or Lose

ePKF is the equivalent PKF token on our launchpad, Red Kite, which means even if you don't stake any PKF on Red Kite, you can get the same tier benefits when owning a corresponding amount of ePKF. For example, owning 500 ePKFs gives you all the Dove tier benefits (including joining IDOs) without staking 500 PKFs. Note: This reward only applies to crowdloan on Red Kite.

0.5

%

Referrals Rewards

The reward is also exclusive for crowdloan on Red Kite. Community members of PolkaFoundry/PolkaSmith can earn some PKF directly by referring friends to join the projects crowdloan on Red Kite. Each referrer and the referred person will receive the amount of PKF equivalent to 0.5% of the referred persons auction incentives.

7,000,000 PKS

Prize Pool

The PolkaSmiths prize tool for Kusama Parachain Slot Auction is worth 7,000,000 PKS, equivalent to 7,000,000 PKF, 3.5% of PKFs total supply (200,000,000 PKF). That means when the KSM in the PolkaSmith crowdloan reaches 70,000, there are no more PKS that can be distributed to contributors and we will stop receiving contributions.

Rewards
Distribution

As soon as contributors join the PolkaSmith crowdloan, 100% ePKF rewards will be delivered immediately. After PolkaSmith wins a parachain slot, 35% of the PKS tokens in the reward pool will go to the contributors' wallet addresses. The remaining 65% of PKS tokens will be locked during the 1st month then be vested over 10 months later.

Frequently Asked Questions

{ selectQuestion(1) }} className={styles.questionTitle}>

When is the PolkaSmith (PolkaFoundry on Kusama) Crowdloan?

Not necessarily. You need to contact your exchange to find out how to participate directly on the exchange. In case it is not supported on your exchange, you would need to unbound, transfer your KSM to polkadot-js extension wallet and use one of the aforementioned methods to participate.
{ selectQuestion(2) }} className={styles.questionTitle}>

What does it mean to unbond my KSM, and how do I do it?

Not necessarily. You need to contact your exchange to find out how to participate directly on the exchange. In case it is not supported on your exchange, you would need to unbound, transfer your KSM to polkadot-js extension wallet and use one of the aforementioned methods to participate.
{ selectQuestion(3) }} className={styles.questionTitle}>

Do I have to unbond my KSM if they are on an exchange?

Not necessarily. You need to contact your exchange to find out how to participate directly on the exchange. In case it is not supported on your exchange, you would need to unbound, transfer your KSM to polkadot-js extension wallet and use one of the aforementioned methods to participate.
{ selectQuestion(4) }} className={styles.questionTitle}>

My friend filled out my referral code. Will we both get $PKF?

Not necessarily. You need to contact your exchange to find out how to participate directly on the exchange. In case it is not supported on your exchange, you would need to unbound, transfer your KSM to polkadot-js extension wallet and use one of the aforementioned methods to participate.
{ selectQuestion(5) }} className={styles.questionTitle}>

Can the pledged KSM be withdrawn at any time?

Not necessarily. You need to contact your exchange to find out how to participate directly on the exchange. In case it is not supported on your exchange, you would need to unbound, transfer your KSM to polkadot-js extension wallet and use one of the aforementioned methods to participate.
{ selectQuestion(6) }} className={styles.questionTitle}>

Will my KSM be returned after the parachain lease ends?

Not necessarily. You need to contact your exchange to find out how to participate directly on the exchange. In case it is not supported on your exchange, you would need to unbound, transfer your KSM to polkadot-js extension wallet and use one of the aforementioned methods to participate.
{ selectQuestion(7) }} className={styles.questionTitle}>

What if PolkaSmith doesnt win the parachain auction - what happens to my KSM?

Not necessarily. You need to contact your exchange to find out how to participate directly on the exchange. In case it is not supported on your exchange, you would need to unbound, transfer your KSM to polkadot-js extension wallet and use one of the aforementioned methods to participate.
{ selectQuestion(8) }} className={styles.questionTitle}>

Where to trade my $PKF reward?

Not necessarily. You need to contact your exchange to find out how to participate directly on the exchange. In case it is not supported on your exchange, you would need to unbound, transfer your KSM to polkadot-js extension wallet and use one of the aforementioned methods to participate.
